Articles.Content:
I tried to take a screenshot to show it here but when I paste it in Paint, it looks fine.

I have DEP disabled, directory in C:\, not read only, no mods, no application that could interfere, everything at max in graphics. I tried to lower some of them but it's the same

No.

Here is tha thing.

Did you use patcher?

If so,

do the following steps:

1. Go into /KSPDIR/GameData/Squad

2. Erase Parts folder.

3. Run patcher.

4. Restart Game.

5. Enjoy single items.

Reason:

They changed Part Config names, so the part.cfg is still there.

So this worked for me.

Yep, for any further discussions see here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95820-Double-parts-%28with-fix%29

Cheers,

~Claw
